hwBgpMIB.name: hwBgpMIB

revisions.description: Add some trap nodes for sending BGP routes threshold alarms, include: 'hwBgpRouteThresholdExceed', 'hwBgpRouteThresholdClear', 'hwBgpRouteMaxExceed', 'hwBgpRouteMaxClear'.

Add some MIB nodes for getting BGP protocol resource information, include: 'hwBgpPeerSessionNum', 'hwIBgpPeerSessionNum', 'hwEBgpPeerSessionNum', 'hwConfiguredVrfs', 'hwConfiguredIpv4Vrfs','hwConfiguredIpv6Vrfs'.

hwBgpMIB.contactinfo: Huawei Industrial Base Bantian, Longgang Shenzhen 518129 People's Republic of China Website: http://www.huawei.com Email: support@huawei.com
hwBgpMIB.description: The Mib module for management of BGP/VPN. Huawei Technologies co.,Ltd. Supplementary information may be available at: http://www.huawei.com

HWBgpAfi.name: HWBgpAfi
HWBgpAfi.description: Address Family Identifier(AFI) for BGP peer.

HWBgpSafi.name: HWBgpSafi
HWBgpSafi.description: Subsequent Address Family Identifier(SAFI) for BGP peer.

MplsL3VpnName.name: MplsL3VpnName
MplsL3VpnName.description: An identifier that is assigned to each MPLS/BGP VPN and is used to uniquely identify it. This is assigned by the system operator or NMS and SHOULD be unique throughout the MPLS domain. If this is the case, then this identifier can then be used at any LSR within a specific MPLS domain to identify this MPLS/BGP VPN. It may also be possible to preserve the uniqueness of this identifier across MPLS domain boundaries, in which case this identifier can then be used to uniquely identify MPLS/BGP VPNs on a more global basis. This object MAY be set to the VPN ID as defined in RFC 2685.
MplsL3VpnName.reference: RFC 2685 Fox B., et al, 'Virtual Private Networks Identifier', September 1999.

hwBgpPeerAddrFamilyTable.name: hwBgpPeerAddrFamilyTable
hwBgpPeerAddrFamilyTable.description: BGP Peer Address Family Table. This table contains information about the address family for BGP peers.

hwBgpPeerAddrFamilyEntry.name: hwBgpPeerAddrFamilyEntry
hwBgpPeerAddrFamilyEntry.description: The information about the address family for BGP peers.

hwBgpPeerInstanceId.name: hwBgpPeerInstanceId
hwBgpPeerInstanceId.description: The index of the instance for the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerAddrFamilyAfi.name: hwBgpPeerAddrFamilyAfi
hwBgpPeerAddrFamilyAfi.description: The index of the address family for the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerAddrFamilySafi.name: hwBgpPeerAddrFamilySafi
hwBgpPeerAddrFamilySafi.description: The index of the sub-address family for the remote peer.

hwBgpPeerType.name: hwBgpPeerType
hwBgpPeerType.description: The type of the address family for the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerIPAddr.name: hwBgpPeerIPAddr
hwBgpPeerIPAddr.description: The IP address of the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerVrfName.name: hwBgpPeerVrfName
hwBgpPeerVrfName.description: The name of the VPN instance.

hwBgpPeerTable.name: hwBgpPeerTable
hwBgpPeerTable.description: BGP Peer Table. This table contains information about the connections for BGP peers.

hwBgpPeerEntry.name: hwBgpPeerEntry
hwBgpPeerEntry.description: The information about the connections with BGP peers.

hwBgpPeerNegotiatedVersion.name: hwBgpPeerNegotiatedVersion
hwBgpPeerNegotiatedVersion.description: The version negotiated with the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerRemoteAs.name: hwBgpPeerRemoteAs
hwBgpPeerRemoteAs.description: The AS number of the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerRemoteAddr.name: hwBgpPeerRemoteAddr
hwBgpPeerRemoteAddr.description: The IP address of the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerState.name: hwBgpPeerState
hwBgpPeerState.description: The status of the remote BGP peer, including: 1: Idle(1) 2: Connect(2) 3: Active(3) 4: Opensent(4) 5: Openconfirm(5) 6: Established(6)

hwBgpPeerFsmEstablishedCounter.name: hwBgpPeerFsmEstablishedCounter
hwBgpPeerFsmEstablishedCounter.description: The Counter That Records the Times the Remote BGP Peer Is Correctly Connected The counter is increased by one if the remote BGP peer is correctly connected once. The counter could be set to zero.

hwBgpPeerFsmEstablishedTime.name: hwBgpPeerFsmEstablishedTime
hwBgpPeerFsmEstablishedTime.description: The counter that records the times the remote BGP peer is correctly connected.

hwBgpPeerGRStatus.name: hwBgpPeerGRStatus
hwBgpPeerGRStatus.description: Graceful restart status of the BGP peer, including: 1: peerNotBeingHelped, indicating that the BGP peer will not be helped during restarting. 2: peerRestarting, indicating that the BGP peer is detected restarting. 3: peerFinishRestart, indicating that the BGP peer finishes the latest GR. 4: peerHelping, indicating that the BGP peer is helping the local end to perform GR.

hwBgpPeerLastError.name: hwBgpPeerLastError
hwBgpPeerLastError.description: The last error code and subcode seen by this peer on this connection. If no error has occurred, this field is zero. Otherwise, the first byte of this two byte OCTET STRING contains the error code, and the second byte contains the subcode.

hwBgpPeerUnAvaiReason.name: hwBgpPeerUnAvaiReason
hwBgpPeerUnAvaiReason.description: Bgp peer down reason including: 1: Configuration lead peer down(1) 2: Receive notification(2) 3: Receive error packet(3) 4: Hold timer expire(4) 5: Remote peer not reachable(5) 6: Direct connect-interface down(6) 7: Route limit(7)

hwBgpPeerRouteTable.name: hwBgpPeerRouteTable
hwBgpPeerRouteTable.description: Route table for BGP Peers This table contains routing information about the BGP peers.

hwBgpPeerRouteEntry.name: hwBgpPeerRouteEntry
hwBgpPeerRouteEntry.description: The routing information about the BGP peers.

hwBgpPeerPrefixRcvCounter.name: hwBgpPeerPrefixRcvCounter
hwBgpPeerPrefixRcvCounter.description: The number of prefixes received from the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerPrefixActiveCounter.name: hwBgpPeerPrefixActiveCounter
hwBgpPeerPrefixActiveCounter.description: The number of active prefixes received from the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerPrefixAdvCounter.name: hwBgpPeerPrefixAdvCounter
hwBgpPeerPrefixAdvCounter.description: The number of prefixes sent to the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerMessageTable.name: hwBgpPeerMessageTable
hwBgpPeerMessageTable.description: Protocol Packet Table for BGP Peers This table contains information about the protocol packets of BGP peers.

hwBgpPeerMessageEntry.name: hwBgpPeerMessageEntry
hwBgpPeerMessageEntry.description: The information about the protocol packets of the BGP peers.

hwBgpPeerInTotalMsgCounter.name: hwBgpPeerInTotalMsgCounter
hwBgpPeerInTotalMsgCounter.description: The total number of protocol packets received from the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerOutTotalMsgCounter.name: hwBgpPeerOutTotalMsgCounter
hwBgpPeerOutTotalMsgCounter.description: The total number of protocol packets sent to the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerInOpenMsgCounter.name: hwBgpPeerInOpenMsgCounter
hwBgpPeerInOpenMsgCounter.description: The total number of Open packets received from the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerInUpdateMsgCounter.name: hwBgpPeerInUpdateMsgCounter
hwBgpPeerInUpdateMsgCounter.description: The total number of Update packets received from the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerInNotificationMsgCounter.name: hwBgpPeerInNotificationMsgCounter
hwBgpPeerInNotificationMsgCounter.description: The total number of Notification packets received from the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerInKeepAliveMsgCounter.name: hwBgpPeerInKeepAliveMsgCounter
hwBgpPeerInKeepAliveMsgCounter.description: The total number of Keepalive packets received from the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerInRouteFreshMsgCounter.name: hwBgpPeerInRouteFreshMsgCounter
hwBgpPeerInRouteFreshMsgCounter.description: The total number of Route-Refresh packets received from the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerOutOpenMsgCounter.name: hwBgpPeerOutOpenMsgCounter
hwBgpPeerOutOpenMsgCounter.description: The total number of Open packets sent to the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerOutUpdateMsgCounter.name: hwBgpPeerOutUpdateMsgCounter
hwBgpPeerOutUpdateMsgCounter.description: The total number of Update packets sent to the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerOutNotificationMsgCounter.name: hwBgpPeerOutNotificationMsgCounter
hwBgpPeerOutNotificationMsgCounter.description: The total number of Notification packets sent to the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerOutKeepAliveMsgCounter.name: hwBgpPeerOutKeepAliveMsgCounter
hwBgpPeerOutKeepAliveMsgCounter.description: The total number of Keepalive packets sent to the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerOutRouteFreshMsgCounter.name: hwBgpPeerOutRouteFreshMsgCounter
hwBgpPeerOutRouteFreshMsgCounter.description: The total number of Route-Refresh packets sent to the remote BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerConfigTable.name: hwBgpPeerConfigTable
hwBgpPeerConfigTable.description: BGP Peer Configuration Table. This table contains the configurations of BGP peers.

hwBgpPeerConfigEntry.name: hwBgpPeerConfigEntry
hwBgpPeerConfigEntry.description: This object indicates the configurations of BGP peers.

hwBgpPeerConfigRouteLimitNum.name: hwBgpPeerConfigRouteLimitNum
hwBgpPeerConfigRouteLimitNum.description: This object indicates the maximum number of routes received from the BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerConfigRouteLimitThreshold.name: hwBgpPeerConfigRouteLimitThreshold
hwBgpPeerConfigRouteLimitThreshold.description: This object indicates the alarm threshold (%) of the maximum number of routes received from the BGP peer.

hwBgpPeerSessionTable.name: hwBgpPeerSessionTable
hwBgpPeerSessionTable.description: BGP Peer Session Table. This table contains BGP peer session informations.

hwBgpPeerSessionEntry.name: hwBgpPeerSessionEntry
hwBgpPeerSessionEntry.description: The information about the BGP peer sessions.

hwBgpPeerSessionRemoteAddrType.name: hwBgpPeerSessionRemoteAddrType
hwBgpPeerSessionRemoteAddrType.description: Bgp peer session remote address type.

hwBgpPeerSessionLocalAddrType.name: hwBgpPeerSessionLocalAddrType
hwBgpPeerSessionLocalAddrType.description: Bgp peer session local address type.

hwBgpPeerSessionUnavailableType.name: hwBgpPeerSessionUnavailableType
hwBgpPeerSessionUnavailableType.description: Bgp peer unavailable type including: 1: Up To Down(1) 2: Always Down(2)

hwBgpPeerSessionReason.name: hwBgpPeerSessionReason
hwBgpPeerSessionReason.description: Bgp peer down reason including: 1: Configuration lead peer down(1) 2: Receive notification(2) 3: Receive error packet(3) 4: Hold timer expire(4) 5: Remote peer not reachable(5) 6: Direct connect-interface down(6) 7: Route limit(7) 8: Peer is not up for a specified long time(8) 100: Alarm clear(100)

hwBgpRouteLimitindex.name: hwBgpRouteLimitindex
hwBgpRouteLimitindex.description: The index of bgp route limit, including: 1.ipv4(1): total ipv4 routes number. 2.ipv6(2): total ipv6 routes number. 3.ipv4vrf(3): ipv4 vrf routes number. 4.ipv6vrf(4): ipv6 vrf routes number. 5.ipv4public(5): ipv4 public routes number. 6.ipv6public(6): ipv6 public routes number. 7.l2ad(7): l2ad routes number.

hwBgpRouteCurNum.name: hwBgpRouteCurNum
hwBgpRouteCurNum.description: The current number of bgp routes.

hwBgpRouteMaxNum.name: hwBgpRouteMaxNum
hwBgpRouteMaxNum.description: The maximum number of bgp routes.

hwBgpRouteThreshold.name: hwBgpRouteThreshold
hwBgpRouteThreshold.description: The threshold number of bgp routes.

hwBgpPeerRouteNumThresholdExceed.name: hwBgpPeerRouteNumThresholdExceed
hwBgpPeerRouteNumThresholdExceed.description: This notification is generated when the number of routes received from the BGP peer exceeds the alarm threshold.

hwBgpPeerRouteNumThresholdClear.name: hwBgpPeerRouteNumThresholdClear
hwBgpPeerRouteNumThresholdClear.description: This notification is generated when the number of routes received from the BGP peer decreases below the alarm threshold.

hwBgpPeerGRStatusChange.name: hwBgpPeerGRStatusChange
hwBgpPeerGRStatusChange.description: This notification is generated when the graceful restart status described by hwBgpPeerGRStatus changes.

hwBgpPeerUnavailable.name: hwBgpPeerUnavailable
hwBgpPeerUnavailable.description: This notification is generated when bgp peer session state change from up to down.

hwBgpPeerAvailable.name: hwBgpPeerAvailable
hwBgpPeerAvailable.description: This notification is generated when bgp peer session state change from down to up.

hwBgpPeerRouteExceed.name: hwBgpPeerRouteExceed
hwBgpPeerRouteExceed.description: This notification is generated when bgp peer session route number exceed.

hwBgpPeerRouteExceedClear.name: hwBgpPeerRouteExceedClear
hwBgpPeerRouteExceedClear.description: This notification is generated when bgp peer session route number exceed clear.

hwL3vpnVrfRouteMidThreshCleared.name: hwL3vpnVrfRouteMidThreshCleared
hwL3vpnVrfRouteMidThreshCleared.description: This notification is generated when the number of routes contained by the specified VRF exceeds the value indicated by mplsL3VpnVrfMidRouteThreshold, and then falls below this value. A single notification MUST be generated when this threshold is exceeded, and no other notifications of this type should be issued until the value of mplsL3VpnVrfPerfCurrNumRoutes has fallen below that of mplsL3VpnVrfConfMidRteThresh.

hwBgpPeerEstablished.name: hwBgpPeerEstablished
hwBgpPeerEstablished.description: The BGP Established event is generated when the BGP FSM enters the ESTABLISHED state.

hwBgpPeerBackwardTransition.name: hwBgpPeerBackwardTransition
hwBgpPeerBackwardTransition.description: The BGPBackwardTransition Event is generated when the BGP FSM moves from a higher numbered state to a lower numbered state.

hwBgpRouteThresholdExceed.name: hwBgpRouteThresholdExceed
hwBgpRouteThresholdExceed.description: This notification is generated when the number of bgp routes exceeds the threshold.

hwBgpRouteThresholdClear.name: hwBgpRouteThresholdClear
hwBgpRouteThresholdClear.description: This notification is generated when the number of routes decreases below the threshold.

hwBgpRouteMaxExceed.name: hwBgpRouteMaxExceed
hwBgpRouteMaxExceed.description: This notification is generated when the number of routes exceeds the maximum number.

hwBgpRouteMaxClear.name: hwBgpRouteMaxClear
hwBgpRouteMaxClear.description: This notification is generated when the number of routes decreases below the maximum number.

hwBgpPeerSessionNum.name: hwBgpPeerSessionNum
hwBgpPeerSessionNum.description: The total number of BGP peer sessions configured.

hwIBgpPeerSessionNum.name: hwIBgpPeerSessionNum
hwIBgpPeerSessionNum.description: The total number of Internal BGP peer sessions configured.

hwEBgpPeerSessionNum.name: hwEBgpPeerSessionNum
hwEBgpPeerSessionNum.description: The total number of External BGP peer sessions configured.

hwBgpVpnTunnelTable.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelTable
hwBgpVpnTunnelTable.description: This object indicates the VPN-tunnel bearing relation table that shows detailed information about the tunnel that bears the VPN service.

hwBgpVpnTunnelEntry.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelEntry
hwBgpVpnTunnelEntry.description: This object indicates detailed information about the tunnel bearing VPN services. This object can be queried, but not be set or created.

hwBgpVpnTunnelVrfName.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelVrfName
hwBgpVpnTunnelVrfName.description: This object indicates the VRF name.

hwBgpVpnTunnelPublicNetNextHop.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelPublicNetNextHop
hwBgpVpnTunnelPublicNetNextHop.description: This object indicates the next hop in the public network.

hwBgpVpnTunnelId.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelId
hwBgpVpnTunnelId.description: The value of this object identifies the tunnel ID.

hwBgpVpnTunnelDestAddr.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelDestAddr
hwBgpVpnTunnelDestAddr.description: This object indicates the destination address of the tunnel.

hwBgpVpnTunnelType.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelType
hwBgpVpnTunnelType.description: The value of this object identifies the tunnel type.

hwBgpVpnTunnelSrcAddr.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelSrcAddr
hwBgpVpnTunnelSrcAddr.description: This object indicates the source address of the tunnel.

hwBgpVpnTunnelOutIfName.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelOutIfName
hwBgpVpnTunnelOutIfName.description: This object indicates the name of the outgoing interface for the tunnel.

hwBgpVpnTunnelIsLoadBalance.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelIsLoadBalance
hwBgpVpnTunnelIsLoadBalance.description: The value of this object identifies whether load balancing is performed.

hwBgpVpnTunnelLspIndex.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelLspIndex
hwBgpVpnTunnelLspIndex.description: The value of this object identifies the index of the primary LSP for the tunnel.

hwBgpVpnTunnelLspOutIfName.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelLspOutIfName
hwBgpVpnTunnelLspOutIfName.description: This object indicates the name of the outgoing interface for the primary LSP of the tunnel.

hwBgpVpnTunnelLspOutLabel.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelLspOutLabel
hwBgpVpnTunnelLspOutLabel.description: The value of this object identifies the outgoing label for the primary LSP of the tunnel.

hwBgpVpnTunnelLspNextHop.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelLspNextHop
hwBgpVpnTunnelLspNextHop.description: This object indicates the next hop for the primary LSP of the tunnel.

hwBgpVpnTunnelLspFec.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelLspFec
hwBgpVpnTunnelLspFec.description: This object indicates the FEC for the primary LSP of the tunnel.

hwBgpVpnTunnelLspFecPfxLen.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelLspFecPfxLen
hwBgpVpnTunnelLspFecPfxLen.description: This object indicates the length of the FEC for the primary LSP of the tunnel.

hwBgpVpnTunnelLspIsBackup.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelLspIsBackup
hwBgpVpnTunnelLspIsBackup.description: The value of this object identifies whether the LSP is the backup LSP.

hwBgpVpnTunnelSignalProtocol.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelSignalProtocol
hwBgpVpnTunnelSignalProtocol.description: The value of this object identifies signaling protocol type of the tunnel.

hwBgpVpnTunnelSessionTunnelId.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelSessionTunnelId
hwBgpVpnTunnelSessionTunnelId.description: The value of this object identifies ID of the tunnel configured through the command.

hwBgpVpnTunnelTunnelName.name: hwBgpVpnTunnelTunnelName
hwBgpVpnTunnelTunnelName.description: This object indicates the tunnel name.

hwBgpVpnServiceIdTable.name: hwBgpVpnServiceIdTable
hwBgpVpnServiceIdTable.description: This object indicates the Service-id of the L3VPN services.

hwBgpVpnServiceIdEntry.name: hwBgpVpnServiceIdEntry
hwBgpVpnServiceIdEntry.description: This object indicates detailed information about the Service-id of L3VPN services. This object can be queried, set but not created.

hwBgpVpnServiceIdVrfName.name: hwBgpVpnServiceIdVrfName
hwBgpVpnServiceIdVrfName.description: This object indicates the VRF name.

hwBgpVpnServiceIdValue.name: hwBgpVpnServiceIdValue
hwBgpVpnServiceIdValue.description: The value of this object identifies the Service-id.

hwConfiguredVrfs.name: hwConfiguredVrfs
hwConfiguredVrfs.description: The number of VRFs that are configured on this node.

hwConfiguredIpv4Vrfs.name: hwConfiguredIpv4Vrfs
hwConfiguredIpv4Vrfs.description: The number of IPv4-family VRFs that are configured on this node.

hwConfiguredIpv6Vrfs.name: hwConfiguredIpv6Vrfs
hwConfiguredIpv6Vrfs.description: The number of IPv6-family VRFs that are configured on this node.

hwBgpCompliance.name: hwBgpCompliance
hwBgpCompliance.description: The compliance statement for Huawei-BGP-VPN MIB

hwBgpPeerAddrFamily.name: hwBgpPeerAddrFamily
hwBgpPeerAddrFamily.description: Address Family Group for BGP peers This table contains members of the address family for BGP peers

hwBgpPeer.description: BGP Peer Group. This table contains members of the connections with BGP peers.

hwBgpPeerRoute.description: Route Group for BGP Peers This table contains members of the routes with BGP peers.

hwBgpPeerMessage.description: Protocol Packet Group for BGP Peers This table contains members of the protocol packets with BGP peers.

hwBgpPeerConfig.description: Configuration Group for BGP Peers. This table contains members of the configurations of BGP peers.

hwBgpTrap.description: Trap Group for BGP Peers. This table contains members of the traps of BGP peers.

hwBgpVpnCompliance.description: The compliance statement for Route Management MIB.

hwBgpVpnServiceIdGroup.name: hwBgpVpnServiceIdGroup
hwBgpVpnServiceIdGroup.description: This object indicates the Service-id of the L3VPN services.

hwTnl2VpnTrapTable.name: hwTnl2VpnTrapTable
hwTnl2VpnTrapTable.description: Tnl2Vpn Trap table. This table contains the trap information. This table is only used for sending trap messages and does not support the get/getnext/set operation.

hwTnl2VpnTrapEntry.name: hwTnl2VpnTrapEntry
hwTnl2VpnTrapEntry.description: This object indicates detailed information about the trap message.

hwVpnId.name: hwVpnId
hwVpnId.description: This object indicates the VPN index.

hwVpnPublicNextHop.name: hwVpnPublicNextHop
hwVpnPublicNextHop.description: This object indicates the public next-hop address.

hwTunnelReachablityEvent.name: hwTunnelReachablityEvent
hwTunnelReachablityEvent.description: This object indicates whether the tunnel is reachable. 1--tunnel reachable. 2--tunnel unreachable.

hwVpnTrapCkeyValue.name: hwVpnTrapCkeyValue
hwVpnTrapCkeyValue.description: This object indicates the ckey value. This value is used for getting next-hop information.

hwTnl2VpnTrapCompliance.name: hwTnl2VpnTrapCompliance
hwTnl2VpnTrapCompliance.description: The compliance statement for Huawei-BGP-VPN MIB.

hwTnl2VpnTrapEvent.name: hwTnl2VpnTrapEvent
hwTnl2VpnTrapEvent.description: This trap indicates whether the tunnel used by a VPN is reachable, If the tunnel is unreachable, a trap is sent to notify the user, hwTunnelReachablityEvent is 2. If the tunnel is reachable, a trap is sent to notify the user, hwTunnelReachablityEvent is 1.

hwBgpTotalRouteNumber.name: hwBgpTotalRouteNumber
hwBgpTotalRouteNumber.description: The total number of BGP routes.

hwOsNodeTable.name: hwOsNodeTable
hwOsNodeTable.description: Table contains some statistic information entries orgnized by os-node.

hwOsNodeEntry.name: hwOsNodeEntry
hwOsNodeEntry.description: Every entry contains some statistic infomation on specific os-node.

hwPeerNumber.name: hwPeerNumber
hwPeerNumber.description: The number of the neighbors on the specific os-group.

hwRouteNumber.name: hwRouteNumber
hwRouteNumber.description: The number of the routes on the specific os-group.

hwDistributeTable.name: hwDistributeTable
hwDistributeTable.description: Table contains some information entries orgnized by distribute-instance.

hwDistributeEntry.name: hwDistributeEntry
hwDistributeEntry.description: Every entry contains some infomation on specific distribute-instance.

hwMigrateSrcSlot.name: hwMigrateSrcSlot
hwMigrateSrcSlot.description: The source slot name the distribute-instances is from when migration happens.

hwMigrateDestSlot.name: hwMigrateDestSlot
hwMigrateDestSlot.description: The destination slot name the distribute-instances is aboute to go when migration happens.

hwMigrateReason.name: hwMigrateReason
hwMigrateReason.description: The reason of a migration when it happens.

hwRpkiSessionTable.name: hwRpkiSessionTable
hwRpkiSessionTable.description: RPKI Session Table. This table contains information about the RPKI sessions.

hwRpkiSessionEntry.name: hwRpkiSessionEntry
hwRpkiSessionEntry.description: The information about the RPKI session.

hwRpkiSessionVrfName.description: The index of the instance for the session.

hwRpkiSessionType.description: The type of the address family for the remote session.

hwSessionIPAddr.name: hwSessionIPAddr
hwSessionIPAddr.description: The IP address of the session.

hwRpkiSessionRoaLimitNum.name: hwRpkiSessionRoaLimitNum
hwRpkiSessionRoaLimitNum.description: The IP address of the session.

hwRpkiSessionRoaExceed.name: hwRpkiSessionRoaExceed
hwRpkiSessionRoaExceed.description: This notification is generated when rpki session ROA number exceed.

hwRpkiSessionRoaExceedClear.description: This notification is generated when rpki session ROA number exceed clear.

hwRpkiCompliance.description: The compliance statement for Huawei-BGP-VPN MIB

hwRpkiSession.name: hwRpkiSession
hwRpkiSession.description: Session Group for RPKI sessions This table contains members of session for RPKI

hwRpkiTrap.description: Trap Group for RPKI Sessions. This table contains members of the traps of RPKI Sessions.

hwFlowSpecStatisticsTable.description: FlowSpec Statistics Table. This table contains information about the FlowSpec Statistics.

hwReIndex.description: The index of the flow route.
